info.description: Amplify is a fully managed continuous deployment and hosting service for modern web apps.
info.title: AWS Amplify

schema.description: Result structure for an Amplify App list request.

items.description: Amplify App represents different branches of a repository for building, deploying, and hosting.

appId.description: Unique Id for the Amplify App.

basicAuthCredentials.description: Basic Authorization credentials for branches for the Amplify App.

createTime.description: Create date / time for the Amplify App.

customRules.description: Custom redirect / rewrite rules for the Amplify App.

condition.description: The condition for a URL rewrite or redirect rule, e.g. country code.

source.description: The source pattern for a URL rewrite or redirect rule.

status.description: The status code for a URL rewrite or redirect rule.

target.description: The target pattern for a URL rewrite or redirect rule.

defaultDomain.description: Default domain for the Amplify App.

enableBasicAuth.description: Enables Basic Authorization for branches for the Amplify App.

enableBranchAutoBuild.description: Enables auto-building of branches for the Amplify App.

environmentVariables.description: Environment Variables for the Amplify App.

iamServiceRoleArn.description: IAM service role ARN for the Amplify App.

branchName.description: Branch Name for Production Branch.

lastDeployTime.description: Last Deploy Time of Production Branch.

updateTime.description: Update date / time for the Amplify App.

nextToken.description: Pagination token. Set to null to start listing Apps from start. If non-null pagination token is returned in a result, then pass its value in here to list more projects.

schema.description: Request structure used to create Apps in Amplify.

basicAuthCredentials.description: Credentials for Basic Authorization for an Amplify App.

customRules.description: Custom rewrite / redirect rules for an Amplify App.

condition.description: The condition for a URL rewrite or redirect rule, e.g. country code.

source.description: The source pattern for a URL rewrite or redirect rule.

status.description: The status code for a URL rewrite or redirect rule.

target.description: The target pattern for a URL rewrite or redirect rule.

enableBasicAuth.description: Enable Basic Authorization for an Amplify App, this will apply to all branches part of this App.

enableBranchAutoBuild.description: Enable the auto building of branches for an Amplify App.

environmentVariables.description: Environment variables map for an Amplify App.

iamServiceRoleArn.description: AWS IAM service role for an Amplify App

oauthToken.description: OAuth token for 3rd party source control system for an Amplify App, used to create webhook and read-only deploy key. OAuth token is not stored.

platform.description: Platform / framework for an Amplify App

delete.description: Delete an existing Amplify App by appId.
